ngiemboon: Yěsô laa kwàʼ ntsẅì nkʉ̀ Ssé.

en: The vine is good when you take care of it.
put a bit of soil all over the place

ngiemboon: Antsyèen pʉ̀a na cúʼtè yɔɔn wɔ́?
en: Where is the facilitator of this meeting?
irony (feel sad while not being so)
give the impression of being unhappy
he who says he is miserable though ..
